thread.title: Mrs CATHERINE HARDT
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Mrs CATHERINE HARDT

author: Mrs CATHERINE HARDT
title: Mrs CATHERINE HARDT
text:
Really great service with very fast delivery and cheap postage.
Sadly had to return the coat as the medium sized coat was about two sizes too large for my 40" chest husband. Very fast response to my return which was excellent also free returns. The only reason why I have given 4 star rather than 5 star is due to feeling the web site should have been more accurate to how oversized the coat actually was. Still an excellent company to deal with. Fast and polite! Thank you üòÅüòÅ
